analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na ācaya gāmim dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ ācaya gāmī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na apacaya gāmim dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ apacaya gāmī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na na iva ācaya gāminā na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa,
analyzed: na iva ācaya gāmi na apacaya gāmī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekavīsa
